summary: A district attorney commits the perfect murder when he kills his daughter's womanizing fiancé and then tries framing the fiancé's lover.
cast: Lionel Barrymore|Kay Francis|Madge Evans|William Bakewell|C. Aubrey Smith|Polly Moran|Alan Mowbray|Forrester Harvey|Charles Crockett|Henry A. Barrows|Carl M. Leviness|Sam McDaniel|Robert McKenzie|Edmund Mortimer|Landers Stevens|Blue Washington
director: Directors: W.S. Van Dyke, Lionel Barrymore (uncredited)
title: Manos culpables
